descriptions.app_description: Interval integration demo that calls a Flask app every minute and sends messages to a Telex channel.

key_features: Calls a Flask endpoint every minute.
Sends formatted messages to a Telex channel.
Easy to deploy and test integration.

settings.label: interval
settings.description: Cron expression defining how often the integration runs (every minute).

settings.label: Webhook URL
settings.description: URL to which webhook payloads are sent.

settings.label: Event Name
settings.description: Event name to be sent in the webhook payload.

settings.label: Status
settings.description: Status indicator sent in the webhook payload.

settings.label: Username
settings.description: Username to be included in the webhook payload.
